org.cloudbus.cloudsim.DatacenterCharacteristics

    • Uses of DatacenterCharacteristics in org.cloudbus.cloudsim

      Classes in org.cloudbus.cloudsim that implement DatacenterCharacteristics 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DatacenterCharacteristicsSimple
      Represents static properties of a Datacenter such as architecture, Operating System (OS), management policy (time- or space-shared), cost and time zone at which the resource is located along resource configuration.
      Fields in org.cloudbus.cloudsim declared as DatacenterCharacteristics 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DatacenterCharacteristics DatacenterCharacteristics.NULL
      A property that implements the Null Object Design Pattern for Datacenter objects.
      Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim that return DatacenterCharacteristics 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DatacenterCharacteristics DatacenterSimple.getCharacteristics() 
      DatacenterCharacteristics Datacenter.getCharacteristics()
      Gets the datacenter characteristics.
      Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim with parameters of type DatacenterCharacteristics 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Sets the datacenter characteristics.
      Constructors in org.cloudbus.cloudsim with parameters of type DatacenterCharacteristics 
      Constructor and Description
      DatacenterSimple(String name, DatacenterCharacteristics characteristics, VmAllocationPolicy vmAllocationPolicy, List<FileStorage> storageList, double schedulingInterval)

    • Uses of DatacenterCharacteristics in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers

      Methods in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.brokers that return types with arguments of type DatacenterCharacteristics 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected Map<Integer,DatacenterCharacteristics> DatacenterBrokerAbstract.getDatacenterCharacteristicsMap()
      Gets the datacenter characteristics map where each key is a datacenter id and each value is its characteristics.
